textBox.richText: Member of the biometric team from Aug 2014 to -- PhD on heterogenous face recognition. Involved in the project HFACE. Tiago was Bachelor in Computer Science at Institute of Mathematics and Computer Science - University of São Paulo (USP). As undergraduate scientific activities, he worked in a research project (http://www2.nilc.icmc.usp.br/wiki/index.php/Principal) funded by FAPESP working with text simplification to brazilian portuguese. In 2010 he joined at CPqD and started to work with face recognition in BioModal project. In 2011 he started his masters project at the University of Campinas (UNICAMP) working with spoof attacks in face authentication systems.
